name: ContextFort
long_description:
ContextFort is bringing the power of AI to the three trillion dollar construction industry, starting with an AI co-pilot that reviews every revision of your architectural and structural drawings in minutes—not weeks.

Our Software:
• Detects missing or conflicting dimensions across sheets
• Highlights overlay mismatches between versions
• Checks if an issue is already resolved in the latest set
• Auto-drafts spec-compliant RFIs so you hit “send,” not “type”

Contractors save 2-3 weeks per project, cut costly rework, and keep schedules on track.
one_liner: Automating drawing reviews for construction contractors
